comment.author: 80878055@N00
comment._content: Photographed on The Mall, Armagh, looking north the small red-bricked masonic hall is left of the tall spire of the first Presbyterian church. Even though he has obscured his face with a salute the Deputy Lieutenant is more than likely H.B Armstrong of Dean's Hill Armagh.

comment.author: 54403180@N04
comment._content: We've now flipped the photo and replaced it - thanks for pointing that out NIreland eye.
comment.authorname: Public Record Office of Northern Ireland
